name: Jumpy Block (FrostyPqnda)
description:
Inspired by the classic Flappy Bird game, Jumpy Block is an endless runner game in which players will jump across the world and stay alive by avoiding objects.

Background Music: 8 Bit Surf by David Renda

Potential bugs:

  • The UI elements might be out of place based on the device it is being played on (please notify me if this happens to you).

Controls:

  • W, SPACE, UP KEY, OR LEFT-CLICK

How to install the game:

Windows:

  1. Download .zip file
  2. Extract file and open the folder
  3. Open SquareJumper.exe

MAC:

  1. Download .zip file
  2. Extract zip file either through the built-in Archive Utility on MAC or through another program such as The Unarchiver
  3. Open JumpyBlock.app

If, for whatever reasons the game refuses to open, try downloading the game through the Itch app.
